title: Rooftop bbq
subtitle: Enjoy a locally cooked bbq on a sunny rooftop with views over the city, hosted by your localife provider
description: Catalonia is famed for its excellent seafood and ingredients. Your host will take you to the market to select fresh ingredients and spices before continuing onto your destination where you can learn the steps to cook a tasty dish.

title: Dancing in Poble Nou
subtitle: Get your dancing shoes on and come shuffle the night away
description: Salsa, tango or even some street dancing your local host will take you to some of the hottest spots in town where you can dance with other locals and learn to move

title: Make your own Macaroons
subtitle: These delicious little treats are a staple of French lifestyle
description: Learn to make these shoux pastries using a techniques taught to you by your local host. Afterwards visit some shops that make some of the best Vol-au-vents in Paris

title: Bicycle tour of the city
subtitle: Cycle around the city with your provider finding the hidden gems of Paris
description: The beautiful range of Apple Natural√© that has an exciting mix of natural ingredients. With the Goodness of 100% Natural Ingredients

title: Rock Climbing
subtitle: Go rock climbing in the Scottish highlands
description: Your localhost will take you into the wilderness to see some of Scottish breathtaking landscape

title: Small aut libero quis
subtitle: Ergonomic executive chair upholstered in bonded black leather and PVC padded seat and back for all-day comfort and support
description: The automobile layout consists of a front-engine design, with transaxle-type transmissions mounted at the rear of the engine and four wheel drive

title: Play Padel
subtitle: Padel is a local sport adored by the Catalans
description: Try your hand at this sport which is a cross between tennis and squash, be prepared to break a sweat

title: Padel Boarding
subtitle: The beaches of Barcelona are a great place to try this
description: Grab a board and a padel and head out into Barceloneta bay where the seas are calm

title: Escape Room
subtitle: Can you get out?
description: Escape rooms are exceptionally popular and they are growing worldwide. Go and escape with a local friend

title: Walk around Freetown
subtitle: Guided tour
description: Your guide will take you on a walking tour of this enigmatic area of Copenhagen. Really get under the skin of this fascinating area.

title: Rosenborg Castle
subtitle: A must when in Copenhagen
description: A tour with a difference as your local guide knows the best times and places to explore this beautiful castle and enjoy some local cuisine afterwards

title: Dinner With The Locals
subtitle: Great way to spend an evening
description: Enjoy a meal with a local Danish family as they cook and prepare a very typical dinner. This is a lovely way to spend and evening and get to know the people

title: See Athletico Play
subtitle: Go watch a football match
description: Athelico Madrid are a great team. Go watch a match with your localhost and experience a matchday in Madrid

title: A walk around Madrid
subtitle: The best way to see the city
description: Embark on a walking tour of the city with your localhost and see some of Madrid's best sites as well as join the locals for drinks in the street

title: Watersports at the Bogatell Beach in Barcelona
subtitle: Watersports in any of its forms, are a pleasure that can almost become an addiction
description: Your day begins at the marina by meeting one of our friendly hosts. We get you familiar with the rented equipment and off we go. We leave the boat ramp and get right into a fast speed zone where guests can speed into open water. After that we are off to the open ocean to jump some waves! Once we are done jumping waves we head towards Barceloneta Beach! Throughout the trip there, guests can see the beauty of the Barcelona skyline on one side and the opean sea on the other. We make it to the final destination where guests can see all the mega cruise ships come and go. From here we head back to the marina while jumping waves and enjoying the adrenaline. This concludes our experience.

title: Paella lunch at Barceloneta Beach
subtitle: Join me in my beautiful apartment by the sea to cook a nice paella and enjoy one of the biggest pleasures of life: FOOD!
description: When visiting Barcelona, one of the highlights is the food. Not only Catalonia is a beautiful region but also boasts some of the best gourmet delicacies in Spain. Typical food in Barcelona is quite different from what you might have in mind if you have tried traditional dishes in other parts of the country. Paella is a traditional Spanish dish. It is a rice dish that can have meat, fish, seafood, and vegetables and is characterized by its use of saffron to give it a yellow color and unique flavor.
